data.text:
@stefanbar @gillianoberholzer @neilbosworth @lyle

We were not aware of the Last Name issue as well.
We rechecked the values yesterday to make sure the issue was sorted before we started but then found that there are a few records that had the undefined on the Last Name.

Lyle will be running a thorough check now and see if the issue occurs on any other Index 360 fields.
